rdf:Description.dc:title: Mammals of southeast Alberta 1986
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Smith, Hugh C.
Alberta. Historical Resources Division.
Provincial Museum of Alberta. Natural History Section.
rdf:Description.dc:description: The study area encompasses the portion of Alberta that is included in the Foremost sheet covering an area of approximately 6100 square miles and inventories and examines the biogeographic affinities of the mammals that occur, either now or in the recent past.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Mammals
